TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed Dns extends System.Object
public ref class Dns abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供簡單的網域名稱解析功能。

span.span: Provides simple domain name resolution functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是靜態類別，擷取特定主機的相關資訊的網際網路網域名稱系統 (DNS)。The class is a static class that retrieves information about a specific host from the Internet Domain Name System (DNS). 主機 DNS 查詢將傳回的資訊中的執行個體類別。The host information from the DNS query is returned in an instance of the class. 如果指定的主機在 DNS 資料庫中，有一個以上的項目包含多個 IP 位址和別名。If the specified host has more than one entry in the DNS database, contains multiple IP addresses and aliases. ## Examples 下列範例會查詢 DNS 資料庫中的主機 www.contoso.com 的詳細資訊。The following example queries the DNS database for information on the host www.contoso.com. [!code-cpp[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會以非同步方式查詢與主機名稱相關聯的 IP 位址的 DNS 伺服器。The method asynchronously queries a DNS server for the IP addresses that are associated with a host name. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`是 IP 位址，而不需要查詢 DNS 伺服器會傳回這個位址。If `hostNameOrAddress` is an IP address, this address is returned without querying the DNS server. > [!NOTE] > 當您在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會發出追蹤資訊。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 如果是空字串傳遞為`hostNameOrAddress`引數，則這個方法會傳回本機主機的 IPv4 和 IPv6 位址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. 非同步作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，會叫用方法`requestCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate. 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要封鎖直到作業完成為止，使用方法。To block until the operation is complete, use the method. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For more information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會查詢與主機名稱相關聯的 IP 位址或 IP 位址的 DNS 伺服器。The method queries a DNS server for the IP address that is associated with a host name or IP address. 如果是空字串傳遞為`hostNameOrAddress`引數，則這個方法會傳回本機主機的 IPv4 和 IPv6 位址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. 如果找不到主機名稱， 11001 （Windows 通訊端錯誤 WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND） 的值會傳回例外狀況。If the host name could not be found, the exception is returned with a value of 11001 (Windows Sockets error WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND). 如果 DNS 伺服器沒有回應時，會傳回此例外狀況。This exception can be returned if the DNS server does not respond. 如果名稱不是正式主機名稱或別名，或它找不到要查詢資料庫中，也會傳回此例外狀況。This exception can also be returned if the name is not an official host name or alias, or it cannot be found in the database(s) being queried. 例外狀況也會傳回，如果`hostNameOrAddress`參數會包含或。The exception is also returned if the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter contains or . 方法會假設，如果 IP 常值字串傳入`hostNameOrAddress`應用程式想要的參數傳回所有的屬性集的執行個體。The method assumes that if an IP literal string is passed in the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter that the application wants an instance returned with all of the properties set. 這些屬性包括， ，和。These properties include the , , and . 如此一來，實作方法傳遞 IP 字串常值時，表現下列行為：As a result, the implementation of the method exhibits the following behavior when an IP string literal is passed: 1. 方法會嘗試剖析位址。The method tries to parse the address. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`參數包含合法的 IP 字串常值，則第一個階段成功。If the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter contains a legal IP string literal, then the first phase succeeds. 2. 使用 IP 字串常值的 IP 位址的反向對應會嘗試取得的主機名稱。A reverse lookup using the IP address of the IP string literal is attempted to obtain the host name. 此結果會設定為屬性。This result is set as the property. 3. 此反向對應的主機名稱來一次取得所有可能的 IP 位址名稱相關聯，並將設為屬性。The host name from this reverse lookup is used again to obtain all the possible IP addresses associated with the name and set as the property. IPv4 字串常值，會對上述所有三個步驟可能會成功。For an IPv4 string literal, all three steps above may succeed. 但很可能過時的 DNS 記錄，實際上是屬於不同的主機，以傳回 IPv4 位址。But it is possible for a stale DNS record for an IPv4 address that actually belongs to a different host to be returned. 這可能會導致步驟 #3 失敗並擲回例外狀況 （沒有 DNS PTR 記錄的 IPv4 位址，但沒有 DNS A 記錄的 IPv4 位址）。This may cause step #3 to fail and throw an exception (there is a DNS PTR record for the IPv4 address, but no DNS A record for the IPv4 address). Ipv6，上述的步驟 #2 可能會失敗，因為大部分的 IPv6 部署不會註冊 IPv6 位址的反向 (PTR) 記錄。For IPv6, step #2 above may fail, since most IPv6 deployments do not register the reverse (PTR) record for an IPv6 address. 因此這個方法可能傳回 IPv6 的字串常值中的完整網域 (FQDN) 主機名稱作為屬性。So this method may return the string IPv6 literal as the fully-qualified domain (FQDN) host name in the property. 方法具有不同的行為，對於 IP 常值。The method has different behavior with respect to IP literals. 如果上述步驟 1 成功 （它能成功剖析為 IP 位址），因此會立即傳回位址。If step #1 above succeeds (it successfully parses as an IP address), that address is immediately returned as the result. 不會在反向對應。There is no attempt at a reverse lookup. IPv6 位址篩選的結果從方法如果在本機電腦沒有安裝 IPv6。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of the method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 如此一來，就可以得到空執行個體只有 IPv6 結果 （如果可用） 的`hostNameOrAddress`.parameter。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `hostNameOrAddress`.parameter. 屬性傳回執行個體不會擴展這個方法，而且將永遠為空白。The property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 當您在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會發出追蹤資訊。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來解決 IP 位址為執行個體。The following example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an instance. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件之後，才會完成`hostNameOrAddress`已經解決。The returned object will complete after the `hostNameOrAddress` has been resolved. 這個方法會查詢 DNS 伺服器的主機名稱相關聯的 IP 位址或 IP 位址。This method queries a DNS server for the IP address that is associated with a host name or IP address. 如果是空字串傳遞為`hostNameOrAddress`引數，則這個方法會傳回本機主機的 IPv4 和 IPv6 位址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. 如果找不到主機名稱， 11001 （Windows 通訊端錯誤 WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND） 的值會傳回例外狀況。If the host name could not be found, the exception is returned with a value of 11001 (Windows Sockets error WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND). 如果 DNS 伺服器沒有回應時，會傳回此例外狀況。This exception can be returned if the DNS server does not respond. 如果名稱不是正式主機名稱或別名，或它找不到要查詢資料庫中，也會傳回此例外狀況。This exception can also be returned if the name is not an official host name or alias, or it cannot be found in the database(s) being queried. 例外狀況也會傳回，如果`hostNameOrAddress`參數會包含或。The exception is also returned if the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter contains or . 這個方法會假設，如果傳入 IP 常值字串`hostNameOrAddress`應用程式想要的參數傳回所有的屬性集的執行個體。This method assumes that if an IP literal string is passed in the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter that the application wants an instance returned with all of the properties set. 這些屬性包括， ，和。These properties include the , , and . IP 字串常值傳遞時，如此一來，此方法的實作表現下列行為：As a result, the implementation of this method exhibits the following behavior when an IP string literal is passed: 1. 方法會嘗試剖析位址。The method tries to parse the address. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`參數包含合法的 IP 字串常值，則第一個階段成功。If the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter contains a legal IP string literal, then the first phase succeeds. 2. 使用 IP 字串常值的 IP 位址的反向對應會嘗試取得的主機名稱。A reverse lookup using the IP address of the IP string literal is attempted to obtain the host name. 此結果會設定為屬性。This result is set as the property. 3. 此反向對應的主機名稱來一次取得所有可能的 IP 位址名稱相關聯，並將設為屬性。The host name from this reverse lookup is used again to obtain all the possible IP addresses associated with the name and set as the property. IPv4 字串常值，會對上述所有三個步驟可能會成功。For an IPv4 string literal, all three steps above may succeed. 但很可能過時的 DNS 記錄，實際上是屬於不同的主機，以傳回 IPv4 位址。But it is possible for a stale DNS record for an IPv4 address that actually belongs to a different host to be returned. 這可能會導致步驟 #3 失敗並擲回例外狀況 （沒有 DNS PTR 記錄的 IPv4 位址，但沒有 DNS A 記錄的 IPv4 位址）。This may cause step #3 to fail and throw an exception (there is a DNS PTR record for the IPv4 address, but no DNS A record for the IPv4 address). Ipv6，上述的步驟 #2 可能會失敗，因為大部分的 IPv6 部署不會註冊 IPv6 位址的反向 (PTR) 記錄。For IPv6, step #2 above may fail, since most IPv6 deployments do not register the reverse (PTR) record for an IPv6 address. 因此這個方法可能傳回 IPv6 的字串常值中的完整網域 (FQDN) 主機名稱作為屬性。So this method may return the string IPv6 literal as the fully-qualified domain (FQDN) host name in the property. 方法具有不同的行為，對於 IP 常值。The method has different behavior with respect to IP literals. 如果上述步驟 1 成功 （它能成功剖析為 IP 位址），因此會立即傳回位址。If step #1 above succeeds (it successfully parses as an IP address), that address is immediately returned as the result. 不會在反向對應。There is no attempt at a reverse lookup. 如果本機電腦沒有安裝 IPv6，IPv6 位址會篩選從這個方法的結果。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of this method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 如此一來，就可以得到空執行個體只有 IPv6 結果 （如果可用） 的`hostNameOrAddress`.parameter。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `hostNameOrAddress`.parameter. 屬性傳回執行個體不會擴展這個方法，而且將永遠為空白。The property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 當您在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會發出追蹤資訊。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
